Header.title: Sudeesha Solutions
Header.paragraph: We build scalable web & mobile applications using .NET, Angular, React, React Native, and modern databases. From development to hosting & deployment — we deliver end-to-end solutions.

About.paragraph: Sudeesha Solutions is an India-based software development company focused on building secure, scalable, and high-performance digital products. Our 5-member team delivers web applications, mobile apps, backend APIs, database solutions, and deployment support for startups and businesses. We believe in clean architecture, transparent communication, and long-term support.

Features.title: Clean & Scalable Code
Features.text: We build maintainable systems with scalable architecture so your product can grow without frequent rework.

Features.title: Security-First Development
Features.text: Secure APIs, authentication best practices, and data protection across the stack.

Features.title: On-Time Delivery
Features.text: Milestone-based planning, weekly updates, and clear delivery timelines.

Features.title: Modern Tech Stack
Features.text: Expertise in .NET/.NET Core, Angular, React JS, React Native, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and Firebase.

Features.title: Deployment & Hosting
Features.text: We manage domains, DNS, SSL, hosting, server setup, and production deployments.

Features.title: Support & Maintenance
Features.text: Post-launch support, bug fixes, enhancements, and performance improvements.

Services.name: Web Development
Services.text: Custom websites, dashboards, admin panels, portals, CRM/ERP modules, and web applications tailored to your business needs.

Services.name: Mobile App Development
Services.text: Cross-platform mobile apps (Android & iOS) using React Native with smooth UX and scalable backend integration.

Services.name: Backend & API Development
Services.text: Robust REST APIs using .NET / .NET Core with authentication, role-based access, and integration-ready architecture.

Services.name: Database Solutions
Services.text: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Firebase (Firestore/Realtime) database design, optimization, and data management.

Services.name: Hosting & Deployment
Services.text: Domain/DNS/SSL setup, cloud hosting, server deployment, CI/CD guidance, and production monitoring support.

Services.name: Maintenance & Support
Services.text: Ongoing maintenance, feature upgrades, security patches, and performance tuning for long-term reliability.

portfolio.name: KYC360
portfolio.text: KYC management web application with secure workflows and admin controls.

portfolio.name: Ticket Booking System
portfolio.text: Booking platform with admin dashboard, listings management, and reporting.

portfolio.name: Himachal Gramin Hut
portfolio.text: Mobile-first platform with backend APIs and database-driven content management.

portfolio.name: Services App
portfolio.text: Service management mobile app with user flows, authentication, and backend integration.

portfolio.name: MyMor
portfolio.text: Social + community platform with real-time features, content management, and scalable Firebase backend.

portfolio.name: Service Lane
portfolio.text: Mobile application with scalable architecture and API-driven modules.
